title: 滑动展示模块 - 模板
content:
[[module ListPages fullname="{$fullname}" limit="1" category="*"]]
[[div class="page-box author"]]
[[div class="page-cover"]]
[!--
[[div class="active %%commented_at|%O%%"]]
RECENT COMMENTS
[[/div]]
[[div class="very-active %%commented_at|%O%%"]]
!! NEW COMMENTS !!
[[/div]]
--]
[[image :first]]
[[div_ class="cover-title {$title-length} {$truncate}-truncate"]]
%%title_linked%%
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="cover-info"]]
[[div_ class="cover-tagline"]]
{$tagline}
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="page-info"]]
[[div_]]
+%%rating%% · %%comments%% 讨论数
[[/div]]
[[div_]]
%%created_at%%
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="table"]]
||~ 页面名称 || %%title_linked%% ||~ {$title-1} || {$text-1} ||
||~ 页面评分 || +%%rating%% ||~ {$title-2} || {$text-2} ||
||~ 发布日期 || %%created_at%% ||~ {$title-3} || {$text-3} ||

||~ 简要说明 || {$summary} ||
||~ 引用 || //{$quote}// ||

||~ 最新评论 || #%%comments%% 由 %%commented_by_linked%% 于 %%commented_at%% ||
[[div_ class="shade" style="background-color: {$shade};"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
author: pokm
